definitions.text: a unit of language that native speakers can identify
examples: words are the blocks from which sentences are made
he hardly said ten words all morning
he didn't say a word about it

definitions.text: information about recent and important events
examples: they awaited news of the outcome
when I give the word, charge!

definitions.text: an exchange of views on some topic
examples: we had a word or two about it

definitions.text: a word is a string of bits stored in computer memory
examples: large computers use words up to 64 bits long

definitions.text: the divine word of God; the second person in the Trinity (incarnate in Jesus)
a secret word or phrase known only to a restricted group
the sacred writings of the Christian religions
examples: he went to carry the Word to the heathen

definitions.text: put into words or an expression
examples: He formulated his concerns to the board of trustees
